channel.title: Comments on: Poemstalking
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: A Poetic Pilgrimage : Part 1 - Luna Station QuarterlyLuna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: A Poetic Pilgrimage : Part 1 - Luna Station QuarterlyLuna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] We’ve already talked about specific locations holding lines of verse, and the scavenger hunt that occurs when we try to find them. This month, ever so slightly more traditionally, let’s talk about visiting places that are associated with poets and poetry, from the past to the present. […]
item.content:encoded: […] We’ve already talked about specific locations holding lines of verse, and the scavenger hunt that occurs when we try to find them. This month, ever so slightly more traditionally, let’s talk about visiting places that are associated with poets and poetry, from the past to the present. […]
